results.name: Largest prime in the denominator of ratio A341528(n)/A341529(n) (when presented in its lowest terms).
link: Index entries for sequences computed from indices in prime factorization
Index entries for sequences related to sigma(n)
program: A003961(n) = { my(f = factor(n)); for (i=1, #f~, f[i, 1] = nextprime(f[i, 1]+1)); factorback(f); };
xref: Cf. A341628 (same sequence applied onto prime shift array A246278).
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, Mar 24 2021
